question: Which of the following is TRUE of social commerce?

answers.text: Social media is on the decline.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Social media actually increases engagement and personalization with customers.

answers.text: Very few brands and companies utilize social media.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Many brands and companies utilize social media

answers.text: Social media is one way to incorporate omnichannel marketing.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Social media continues to be on the rise

answers.text: Social media decreases personalization with customers.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Social media is one way in which companies can utilize an omnichannel marketing strategy, one in which utilizes many different channels to reach customers.

detailedSolution: Social media is one way in which companies can utilize an omnichannel marketing strategy, one in which utilizes many different channels to reach customers.
